'''1.14.21''' is a hotfix to {{el|be}} released only for Fire tablets on January 31, 2020,<ref>{{cite|url=https://bugs.mojang.com/rest/api/2/project/MCPE/versions|title=MCPE versions|website=Mojira API}}</ref> which fixes two Realms bugs.{{Dubious|reason=We don't actually know why this version was released. The two bugs mentioned in the article were fixed via the server update.}}
